description: Learn how to care for the many wonderful animals we share our world with
They're just words, but put them in the right order, and they become stories
Explore your imagination by designing a concept model and bring it to life.
It's time for a camp trip! From tents to fire building, here's your ticket to becoming a crafty camper.
For thousands of years, people have collected artefacts, objects, and treasures. Now it's your turn.
Listen up! from simple phone calls to secret codes, Scouts are fantastic communicators.
Discover how to whip up the tastiest food for you and your friends. Ready. Steady. Cook.
Dance. Paint. Build. Whatever you create, your imagination can conquer the world.
With the wind in your hair and feet in your shoes, you can steer yourself in any direction you choose. Helmets at the ready!
Get ready to explore and learn about disability.
Volcano eruptions, slime, and rainbow flowers. Welcome to the world of scientific experiments
Whether you're a Beaver or spaceman like Tim Peake, Scouts are explorers. Get your maps ready!
Whatever your beliefs, join us to celebrate what's important to you.
With a splash of water and a ray of sunshine, you can grow flowers, plants and trees. Bring the forest home.
Help make the world a better place, learn about important global issues and play your part in helping change the world.
Eating healthily and to staying active, helps Scouts be at their very best.
It's confident individuals that make our Scout pack strong, so let's celebrate our individuality.
At Scouts, we are proud of our international identity, so let's celebrate and learn more about our world.
Learn how to be confident in decisions around money.
How do you see the world? Grab a camera, take some photos, and share your vision.
Everyone wants to get out there and explore, but before you can do that, you need to learn how to stay safe and sound.
Get ready to explore the stars, planets and beyond. Got your space suit on? Good, Let’s go...
All sports stars started somewhere. How far can you go?
Gaze up at the stars! Fly a kite! Blaze a trail! This award is all about having adventures wherever you are
Fall asleep under the stars on your first proper camp, learn to identify different animals and plants and explore the great outdoors.
Your body and mind are the most precious instruments you'll ever own. Get the cogs whirring and move your feet! It's time to develop some new skills.
You don't have travel far and wide to learn about how the world works. Discover a range of exciting cultures and traditions, right on your doorstop.
Everyone finds different things easy or tricky. Choose two personal challenges you'd love to accomplish and dive right in.
Two hands are better than one. Four hands are better than two. Gather into a team with your fellow Beavers, and accomplish something awesome together.
From the neighbourhood cat to the creepy crawlies at the bottom of the garden, let’s learn how to look after the creatures we share our planet with.
Grab a paintbrush, build a masterpiece out of clay, or get behind the camera. It’s time to let your imagination run wild.

requirements.text: Complete 3 of 10 requirements to earn this badge.

description: Run! Jump! Throw! Whichever sport you decide to have a go at, this badge is about trying your best and improving as you practice.
Already earned your Athletics badge? Ready for the next step? This badge will help you refine your technique and soar to new heights.

requirements.text: Complete 6 of 9 requirements to earn this badge.

description: You don’t necessarily need to use pots and pans to cook something delicious. Make the most of your surroundings, and enjoy a delicious meal in the great outdoors.
Books are like portals to another world, allowing us to walk in another person’s shoes for a while and see how they fit. Get lost in the pages, and see where you end up.
Being able to prepare a meal for yourself and others is one of life's most rewarding skills. Wash your hands, put on your apron, and get ready to cook up a storm.

Our belongings tell stories, and even the most ordinary looking objects can teach us a great deal about the people who owned them and how they lived. Build up a collection of things that interest you, and share them with your friends.
Whether you’re decoding a secret message, learning sign language or playing a game of Chinese whispers, this badge is all about getting your message across effectively.
With the wind in your hair and feet in your shoes, you can steer yourself in any direction you choose. Helmets at the ready!
Hammer, hang, sand and stain. Make some nice things for your home – or repair them again!
Discover how to make the world a more inclusive place for everyone.
Psst! Did you know David Bowie first performed at a local Scout show? With a little planning and confidence, you too can steal the show. Lights! Camera! Action!

requirements.text: Complete 2 of 9 requirements to earn this badge.

description: From the air we breathe to the soil we stand upon and the energy we use to power our homes, we rely on the earth’s resources for our very survival. Let’s work together to protect it.
Giddy up and get ready to ride! It’s time to show off your skills in the saddle.
Flames fuel our campfires and keep us snuggly and warm. But they can also be very dangerous and spread very quickly.  Learn how to handle fire safely, and find out what to do in an emergency.
Experience the joy of gardening and get to know your vegetables, fruits and herbs.

The Scouts are proud to support the Global Goals that children, adults and governments all over the world are aiming to achieve. Together, we can make the world a better place, and it all starts with you.
Do you have a special hobby you already love to practice? Share your expertise with the group, or try something new.
Bubble, boil, sweep and steam! Learn how to keep things tidy and clean!
Everyone should feel safe and snug in their own space. Learn how to prevent accidents in the home, and find out what to do if they happen.
At Scouts, we’re proud of our international identity. Join us in celebrating different cultures around the world. Where would you most like to go? What would you most like to see?
Have an adventure on your very own doorstop! Become a tourist in your hometown! This badge is all about celebrating the streets you call home, and seeing them through fresh eyes.

requirements.text: Complete 3 of 5 requirements to earn this badge.

description: This badge is all about growing healthy and strong, and staying calm under pressure. Learn to control your body and mind, and you’ll be a Martial Arts master in no time. KAPOW!
Learn how to be confident in decisions around money.
Having a faith means having complete confidence and trust in something that matters to you. Whether you have a religion you follow or not, join us to celebrate what faith means.
Learn how to identify different trees, birds and flowers. Sit back and watch the seasons change.
When you’re out and about having adventures, keeping yourself safe is a must. Find out how to protect yourself in a range of sticky situations.
Cameras let us freeze moments in time so we can revisit them later. Capture some amazing photos of your favourite people and places, and hang them proudly on the wall.
Our bodies are the greatest instruments we will ever own. To function at their best, they need fuel and exercise. Let’s go!
Learn how to make structures from basic materials and work together to build something great.
Cars are an important part of everyday life in most of the world, especially if you want to get out there and explore the open road. Learn how to identify different traffic signs and stay safe.

From the cells in our bodies to the energy fuelling our homes and the stars in the night sky, we use science to find out more about the mind-boggling universe we call home. Pop on your safety goggles and get experimenting.
Grab a scooter. Lace up your rollerblades. Hop on a board. You might be a bit wobbly at first, but with a little practice you’ll be gliding effortlessly before you know it!

12 people have walked on the moon. 11 of them were Scouts. Expand your horizons and reach for
the stars, as you get to grips with our mind-boggling solar system
If you love sport but would prefer to follow it rather than play it, now’s your chance to develop some expert knowledge.
Sail down a river.  Ride a wave. Snorkel through the seven seas! If you’d like to feel more confident and comfortable in the water, this badge is for you.

Having faith means having complete confidence and trust in someone or something that matters to you. Whether you have a religion you follow or not, join us on a journey to meet people from all over the world, and find out how they define and celebrate what’s important.
From grass sledging to zorbing, this award is all about embracing adventure and unlocking new talents. Step outside your comfort zone
Build a shelter. Sleep beneath the stars. The Great Outdoors await you.
completion_rules: 1 from Camping Experience + 9 from Core Camp Skills + 2 from Additional Camp Activities

requirements.text: 1 from Camping Experience + 9 from Core Camp Skills + 2 from Additional Camp Activities.

description: Change a tyre. Pen a short story. Cook up a storm. This award is all about gaining new skills
Discover a whole world of cultures and traditions, right on your doorstep.
Everyone has a different idea of what a challenge looks like. Choose two you'd love to accomplish and dive right in.
Every team needs a leader to make things happen. Share your skills with others and make sure the voice of each and every Cub is heard.
Two hands are better than one. Four hands are better than two. Work together to achieve a goal within your Pack, and take one for the team.
Once you've made your Promise, you'll earn your Membership Award, featuring an image of the fleur de lis. This is the international Scout symbol, worn by Scouts all over the world.

requirements.text: 1. Find out about the Cub Pack
Find out about joining your Pack
Become a Cub Scout by making the Promise

description: Giving your time goes along way. Join us in making sure our activity centers continue to inspire.
All Olympic athletes started somewhere, how far will you go?
A night sleeping under the stars? Nothing better, but we Scouts know it takes time, readiness and know-how to get it right
completion_rules: 1 from Camp + 4 from Demonstrate + 14 from Camp Leader

requirements.text: 1 from Camp + 4 from Demonstrate + 14 from Camp Leader.

description: You're underground with just your torch to guide you, traversing through this ancient paradise. There's nothing quite like caving.
Supported by a friend, chalk covered fingers, your foot reaches the ridge. This is how you climb to the top.
Sing. Paint. Make. Whatever you create, let your imagination lead the way
Embody the spirit of Scouts and learn how to make an impact through fundraising.
The Scouts are proud to support the Global Goals. Join us, and take an active role in making our world a better, more sustainable environment.

requirements.text: Complete 3 of 5 requirements to earn this badge.

description: From Ben Nevis and Snowdon, to Scafell Pike. Get a head-start on the highest peaks in the UK.
What's next? Share your knowledge, teach others, and inspire the next generation.
At Scouts, we are proud of our international identity, so let's celebrate and learn more about our world.

requirements.text: Complete 4 of 6 requirements to earn this badge.

description: Taking the lead can go a long way. Learn effective leadership skills that will help support you and your team.
completion_rules: 1 from Leadership + 1 from  + 1 from  + 1 from Task

requirements.text: 1 from Leadership + 1 from  + 1 from  + 1 from Task.

description: Would you know what to do if someone's life was in danger? Get prepared today.
From TV and newspapers to online news, every organisation needs media coverage. Through Scouts, discover how to spread the word
completion_rules: 1 from  + 1 from  + 1 from List A + 1 from List B

requirements.text: 1 from  + 1 from  + 1 from List A + 1 from List B.

description: Learn how to be confident in decisions around money.
The thrill of the race, the speed, the control. Are you ready to get behind a wheel and take to a track?
Up high with the wind in your hair, finding your route down the mountain is a challenge to remember
The sound of birdsong, surrounded by trees, mud underfoot, it feels good to be in the wild.
The challenge of the performing arts: honesty, confidence, and expression, all words that define a Scout
Scouts are forward thinkers, we continue to challenge ourselves, always looking to develop our skills.
Knots, lashings, blocks and anchors. Learn how to make something essential from the bare necessities, and become a great pioneer.
If you practice, persevere and improve your technique, you’ll be hitting backhand volleys worthy of Centre Court
From the weather around us to the electronics we use, learn more about the science we all rely on.
If you've a passion for the wonders of the universe, are fascinated by the next steps of space exploration or just enjoy looking at the night sky, then the Explorers Space badge is the one for you.
Whether you drop in, jump up, or skate down, share your passion. From the street to the Sixer.
Be prepared for the unexpected! Develop your survival skills to be self-reliant in tough conditions and an awareness of natural resources and how to use them.
View the world from the ocean. Travel down a river. Explore the depths of a lake; and get soaked in the process.

requirements.text: Complete 1 of 4 requirements to earn this badge.

description: The Explorer Belt is a challenge of a lifetime. It's a chance to take part in a ten-day expedition that brings you a real understanding of a different country, its culture and way of life.
Scout Activity Centres thrive on team work, friendship and outdoor adventure. Develop your campsite management skills and help the centres continue to inspire.
completion_rules: 3 from Core Requirements + 4 from Activity Centre Skills

requirements.text: 3 from Core Requirements + 4 from Activity Centre Skills.

description: Discover one of man’s greatest accomplishments – developing the technology to fly through the air.
Take up your binoculars, observe the skies, and learn to recognise an Airbus from a Boeing
completion_rules: 1 from  + 1 from  + 1 from Category A + 1 from Category B

requirements.text: 1 from  + 1 from  + 1 from Category A + 1 from Category B.

badge_name: Air or Sea Navigation Activity Badge
description: Be the one who knows the way to go – at sea or by air. Learn a skill that would help you navigate your crew on your journey.
Develop your angling acumen, the sense of pride from reeling in a big catch to the enjoyment from being outside and close to the water’s edge. This badge is endorsed by The Angling Trust.
Express yourself! Stretch your imagination and discover the artist within you.
completion_rules: 3 from Group 1 + 1 from Group 2 + 4 from Group 3 (Required)

requirements.text: 3 from Group 1 + 1 from Group 2 + 4 from Group 3 (Required).

description: Wipe the sweat from your brow, as you close in your personal best. Athletics is all about practising, persevering and improving – perfect for a Scout like you.
Go the extra distance with the Athletics Plus badge and reach new heights.
Get Up and have fun in the great outdoors. Forge new skills as you camp under canvas for at least 15 nights.
From stalactites to stalagmites, experience a different world underground and explore fascinating cave formations

requirements.text: Complete requirements to earn this badge.

description: Plan and produce a tasty menu for your Scout troop after they come back after a long day of activities.
Plan and produce a tasty menu for your Scout troop after they come back after a long day of activities.

requirements.text: Plan a menu for a weekend event for between four and six people.
Show how and where to shop for the food and the best way to transport it.
Show how to store food properly, hygienically and in ways that prevent food poisoning.
Cook and serve at least one of the meals from your menu.
Demonstrate the best way to clear up afterwards.

description: Come and join the big top, be the star attraction, and entertain with your ace circus skills.
Climbing requires an inner determination to reach the summit, communication skills and working as part of team - perfect for a scout like you.
Communication can help us reach out to more people, from longer distances and using a wide range of languages. Work towards your Communicator badge and help bring people closer together.
Unleash your crafty creativity and take your crafting skills to the next level.
Experience the thrill of the ride! Make certain your cycling skills are top-knotch as you plan your next cycling adventure.
Build, Modify or Repair – Develop your DIY acumen, and learn how to deal with emergencies and tackle DIY projects
Get up and get in the water and have a go at this ancient and exciting Chinese team sport
There’s a bright spark in us all. Master the clever systems and circuits to support modern life.
Showcase your performing talent, accept a standing ovation and have fun mastering an original piece of entertainment.
Make a difference a play an active part in improving the environment in your local area. Complete the badge and help protect the environment for future generations.
Perfect your walk, trot and canter. Showcase your horsemanship skills and create an emotional and trusted bond with your horse
Learn about the process behind the food on our plates. You'll get some hands-on practical experience and develop a deeper appreciation for the natural world.
Learn the fire safety essentials. Master the precautionary measures to take to prevent a fire.
Discover how to manage and identify trees – and help preserve our woodland.
Become the inspiration for people to start supporting good causes.
Discover the exciting adventure of geocaching, where you can enjoy the freedom of being outside and identifying new places. All you require is a handheld GPS device and a sense of fun.
Help make the world a better place, learn about important global issues and play your part in helping change the world.
Whistle down the wind, increase your stamina and explore the UK's green and pleasant lands.
Take part in a hobby and develop your skills. You could choose to develop your creative and artistic flair, play sports or take part in other pursuits.

requirements.text: Complete 1 of 2 requirements to earn this badge.

description: We prepare young people with skills for life. Each year we help over 460,000 girls and boys enjoy fun and adventure while developing skills to succeed. Do more. Learn more. Be more.
Explore the culture and traditions of other countries. Your journey will broaden your horizons as you learn about different communities.
Discover a world of knowledge at your fingertips. Showcase your library catalogue knowledge and other librarian skills.
Develop your Lifesaver decision-making and planning skills. Become primed in understanding how to react in emergency situations.
Get to know your local area like the back of your hand. Explore all its routes, roads and useful places.
Hone your combat skills in Martial Arts. Display a blend of strategy, strength and calmness under pressure.
Shoot an arrow with precision, Fire a rifle with pinpoint accuracy or fence with Olympian finesse.
Fuel your imagination and develop problem-solving and critical thinking skills. Develop your practical vehicle maintenance knowledge.
Rain or shine, wind or snow – ignite your passion for the weather.
Show your creativity and attention to detail as you become an expert Model Maker.

requirements.text: Complete 1 of 5 requirements to earn this badge.

description: Learn how to be confident in decisions around money.
Develop a deeper aptitude of your beliefs and how they help to guide you through all the stages of your life
Become a great Naturalist and play your part in preserving the natural world as a whole.
Find your way from one point to another, using only a map, a compass and your brain
Take flight and experience the thrill of parascending. Adventure awaits!
Take an image, freeze a moment, and discover the art of photography.
Have fun and take part in a physical activity and improve both your body and mind.
Master your pioneering skills in using ropes, wooden spars and knots. Become a key member of your team as you create amazing structures.
Have fun on the water by mastering the waterways in your chosen boat.
Take a stroke, cut through the water, and become a rowing master.
completion_rules: 2 from Equipment + 7 from Safety + 4 from Manoeuvres + 2 from Tasks

requirements.text: 2 from Equipment + 7 from Safety + 4 from Manoeuvres + 2 from Tasks.

description: Keep your scout troop well stocked with supplies by discovering what it takes to be a great quartermaster.
Spark your curiosity and creativity with the Scientist activity badge. Have fun learning some valuable science-based skills.
Discover what things are out there in our universe and learn how to navigate with the stars. How would you travel through space to make new discoveries?
If you follow a sport, rather than take part, you can prove your expert knowledge through this badge. You can choose anything from football or basketball to archery, motor racing or water polo.
Be spontaneous, improvise and show your creativity. Take up the challenge and get involved in a street sport like skateboarding, in-line skating or Parkour.
Be prepared for the unexpected! Develop your survival skills to be self-reliant in tough conditions and an awareness of natural resources and how to use them.
From scuba diving to water skiing, hit the water and indulge your passion, for a fantastic water activities experience.
Discover the true meaning to the world’s different faiths, so you can find common ground in your personal relationships.
Develop the craft of storytelling through writing. Reach into your imagination and you could be the next Philip Pullman or Cressida Cowell.

requirements.text: Complete 4 of 10 requirements to earn this badge.

description: Abseil down a mountain! Sail down a river! Hover on a hovercraft! It’s time to embrace four new adventurous activities, and see where they take you
Whether you’re trying your hand at web design or mastering an ancient craft like needlework, take your creative skills to the next level and make something extraordinary from scratch.
Are you ready for your next big adventure? Take part in a two-day expedition or exploration, in the UK or abroad
Spend eight nights away from home. Cook a meal on camp. Tread new ground. It’s time to find your feet in the great outdoors
Everyone has a different idea of what a challenge looks like. Choose two you'd love to accomplish and dive right in
Everyone has to start somewhere, and practice makes perfect. Hone your skills over a six-week period, and see how quickly you will soar!
Learn how to lead by example and take one for the team!
Two hands are better than one. Four hands are better than two. Work with your fellow Scouts over a three-month period, and achieve something truly awesome together.
Whether you’re volunteering in your local community or learning about an international issue, this award is all about exploring the world from your doorstep and making a positive impact.

In their Troop, Scouts join a Patrol - a smaller group led by a Patrol Leader and Assistant Patrol Leader. These older Scouts handle leadership duties like welcoming newcomers and running activities. Some Troops also have Senior Patrol Leaders with extra responsibilities. All leaders wear distinctive stripes to show their roles.

requirements.text: No formal requirements - awarded by leader discretion

description: Bodies can do great things. Explore new ways to move, learn fun new games, and help your friends do their best.
People (and animals) can build all sorts of amazing things of different shapes and sizes. Now it’s your turn to create something exciting. Your imagination’s the limit.
Scientists learn how the world works by asking big questions and giving things a go. Now it’s your turn to try some experiments and see what you can discover.
The world is full of exciting things for you to discover. Work together to get ready, go on an adventure, and share what you find. Who knows where you’ll end up?

We look after our bodies by doing things like brushing our teeth and eating different foods. Have you ever thought about how we look after our minds? Get stuck in and learn about three ways to take care of yourself and your brain.
Draw. Sing. Move. Build. Create. There are lots of different ways to let your imagination go wild. What will you try first?
Wild animals make the world a better place. Learn about animals that live nearby and far away, then work together to help them.
Plants are all around us (and we eat them every day) – but do you know how they grow?
People all around the world celebrate things that are important to them with stories, songs, skills, and snacks. Now it’s your turn to get stuck in.
Superheroes don’t just exist in books, comics, and films. Real-life superheroes are all around us, doing great things to help people every day.
Fly a rocket into the stars like an astronaut and discover things about different planets and our moon.
Let your imagination run wild as you get lost in a story and see where it takes you.
What’s your favourite thing to eat? Learn more about food then put on your apron and cook up a storm.
Go on a scavenger hunt. Gaze up at the stars. Enjoy your first campfire. Pack your bag and try something new as you go on an adventure in the great outdoors.
There’s no one else who’s exactly like you. Think about what makes you unique, learn about the people around you, and set yourself a challenge
Learn about where you live, meet some new people, and discover more about your community. It’s time to find your place in the world
We can do so much more with great friends. Work together to play games, make choices, and learn to be the best friend you can be.
If you’ve enjoyed completing an Activity Badge, go above and beyond the requirements and set yourself a new challenge on a similar topic

requirements.text: Complete 1 hike to earn this badge.
Complete 10 hikes to earn this badge.
Complete 15 hikes to earn this badge.
Complete 2 hikes to earn this badge.

Complete 50 hikes to earn this badge.

Complete 200 nights away to earn this badge.

Complete 35 nights away to earn this badge.
Complete 4 nights away to earn this badge.

Complete 10 time on water to earn this badge.
Complete 15 time on water to earn this badge.
